note.p:
For nos 362 and 376 see M to M. Holtze, November 1883. See also M to M. Holtze, 6 January 1884, 6 February and 31 August 1884.
HC: don't see the correction with 31 Aug..
These cross references will all need chasing up when this is worked out fully; I think so have already been redated
